file_content.text: Don't be an imbecile. The weapon's obviously my creation. If you use it against the Hutt Cartel, I'll be looking for my vertebrae in a trash compactor. Deal's off.
No, Tharan Cedrax. I will take the prototype to the Master drenched in your blood!
You won't serve your Master by getting angry.
Calm down.
We can negotiate here.
Threatening people in front of a Jedi isn't clever.
Don't make me intervene.
Just a small Jedi. I've stood before a great Master. In a few words, he showed me the true way.
I'm begging you, don't get him started on this again.
The darkness is coming, and the gangs of Nar Shaddaa are united against it. We are the Master's Guiding Hand, to crush the Hutt Cartel!
Who is this Master you keep talking about? What's his name?
Tell me about your Master.
He is the Master. He needs no name.
What does the Hutt Cartel have to do with this "darkness"?
Why the Hutt Cartel?
It is an agent of the darkness. The Master taught us.
Bold words for street rats.
We serve the Master! His will makes us invincible!
Now stand aside. I swore to bring Cedrax's prototype to the Master. Perhaps he will grant us an audience!
I want to stop the darkness too. Let me join you and learn at your Master's feet.
Bring me to the Master.
You? You're not fit to join us. Only Nikto are worthy.
Most Nikto are only worthy to kiss up to Hutts. Seems like you can't even do that anymore.
This Master has affected your mind. You're doing this under suggestion.
You've been brainwashed.
You dare insult the Master?
I dislike being told what to do.
I don't take orders.
Enough! No one will stand in the way of the Master's work! The Hutt Cartel must fall!
